column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A preliminary report said that a couple of suspects armed with knives robbed ------more than $ 30
column4: 000 from a Chinese grocery store and escaped.------The incident occurred at 11:00 pm on Monday
column8: in front of Sorya Shopping Center
column11: Phnom Penh.------Deputy Inspector of Daun Penh Police confirmed the robbery
column12: and said the victim police station to file a report.------http://tnn-news.com/archives/128658------
